name: Brick Exorcist
description:
✦Easy to operate and fun to play✦

Drag the mouse to shoot the ball, hit and destroy the bricks!

✦Easy yet strategic✦

Different bricks have different effects. Use the best strategy, or you may be into trouble.

✦Multiple game modes✦

• Story mode: experience the authentic story performing a brick exorcist

• Endless mode: experience the fun of breaking bricks in randomly generated levels
• Edit mode: create your own level, share to the world through Workshop

✦Multiple choices and endings✦

Make different choices, experience different plots. Different endings are waiting to be revealed, including the hidden ending!

✦Easy to use editor✦

The built-in editor is easy to use, and you can create interesting levels with a few clicks of the mouse. Upload to the workshop and share your levels with everyone!
